subject: Kiteboarding
Windsurfing
Olympic Games (2016)
lead_paragraph: The sport of kite boarding, is still in its infancy, having had its first world championship only three years ago, but will be an Olympic sport in 2016.
snippet: The sport of kite boarding, is still in its infancy, having had its first world championship only three years ago, but will be an Olympic sport in 2016.
